questions.text: What is the capital of France?
questions.possibleAnswers: A. Paris, B. London, C. Berlin, D. Rome

questions.text: Explain the concept of object-oriented programming.
questions.correctAnswer: Object-oriented programming is a programming paradigm that is based on the concept of objects, which can contain data (properties) and code (methods). The main principles of OOP are encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
